revised_title: Experimental Results from the TFTR Tokamak: Advancements in Controlled Nuclear Fusion
tldr: The article discusses the experimental results from the Tokamak Fusion Test Reactor (TFTR) and its advancements in controlled nuclear fusion. The TFTR tokamak has reached its original machine-design specifications and has extended its operating regime in both ohmic and neutral-beam-heated discharges. The focus is on the wide operating range of TFTR, which has facilitated transport and scaling studies, and the results of these confinement studies are presented.
